contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} [[File:Kumage District in Kagoshima Prefecture.png|thumb|250px|Kumage District in Kagoshima Prefecture.]] {{Nihongo|'''Kumage'''|熊毛郡|Kumage-gun}} is a [[districts of Japan|district]] located in [[Kagoshima Prefecture|Kagoshima]], [[Japan]]. The district covers two islands from the [[Ōsumi Islands]], [[Tanegashima]] and [[Yakushima]]. The district has an estimated [[population]] of 29,706 with a total area of 789.16 km².(According to 2005 Census) Contains 3 towns: *[[Nakatane, Kagoshima|Nakatane]] *[[Minamitane, Kagoshima|Minamitane]] *[[Yakushima, Kagoshima|Yakushima]] ==History== *April 1, 1889 - Due to the town and village status enforcement, the villages of Kitatane, Nakatane, and Minamitane were formed within Kumage District.(3 towns) *March 29, 1896 - Absorbed [[Gomu District, Kagoshima|Gomu District]].(5 villages) *April 1, 1926 - The village of Kitatane gained town status and renamed to become the town of Nishiomote. *November 10, 1940 - The village of Nakatane gained town status.(2 towns, 3 villages) *October 15, 1956 - The village of Minamitane gained town status.(3 towns, 2 villages) *April 1, 1958 - The village of Kamiyaku gained town status.(4 towns, 1 village) *October 1, 1958 - The town of Nishiomote gained city status.(3 towns, 1 village) *April 1, 1959 - The village of Shimoyaku gained town status and renamed to become the town of Yaku.(4 towns) *October 1, 2007 - The towns of [[Kamiyaku, Kagoshima|Kamiyaku]] and [[Yaku, Kagoshima|Yaku]] merged to form the town of Yakushima.(3 towns) ==Transportation== *[[Yakushima Airport]] is located on Yakushima in Yakushima. *[[New Tanegashima Airport]] is located on Tanegashima in Nakatane. <!--<table border="1" cellspacing="0" style="border-collapse:collapse" style="font-size:x-small"> <tr> <th>明治22年4月1日</th> <th>明治22年 - 大正15年</th> <th>昭和1年 - 昭和19年</th> <th>昭和20年 - 昭和64年</th> <th>平成1年 - 現在</th> <th>現在</th> </tr> <tr> <td bgcolor="#99CCFF">北種子村</td> <td bgcolor="#66FFFF">大正15年4月1日<br />町制改称 西之表町</td> <td bgcolor="#66FFFF">西之表町</td> <td>昭和33年10月1日<br>市制</td> <td>西之表市</td> <td>西之表市</td> </tr> <tr> <td bgcolor="#99CCFF">中種子村</td> <td bgcolor="#99CCFF">中種子村</td> <td bgcolor="#66FFFF">昭和15年11月10日<br />町制</td> <td bgcolor="#66FFFF">中種子町</td> <td bgcolor="#66FFFF">中種子町</td> <td bgcolor="#66FFFF">中種子町</td> </tr> <tr> <td bgcolor="#99CCFF">南種子村</td> <td bgcolor="#99CCFF">南種子村</td> <td bgcolor="#99CCFF">南種子村</td> <td bgcolor="#66FFFF">昭和31年10月15日<br />町制</td> <td bgcolor="#66FFFF">南種子町</td> <td bgcolor="#66FFFF">南種子町</td> </tr> <tr> <td>馭謨郡<br>上屋久村</td> <td bgcolor="#99CCFF">明治29年3月29日<br>熊毛郡</td> <td bgcolor="#99CCFF">上屋久村</td> <td bgcolor="#66FFFF">昭和33年4月1日<br />町制</td> <td rowspan=2 bgcolor="#66FFFF">平成19年10月1日<br>屋久島町</td> <td rowspan=2 bgcolor="#66FFFF">屋久島町</td> </tr> <tr> <td>馭謨郡<br>下屋久村</td> <td bgcolor="#99CCFF">明治29年3月29日<br>熊毛郡</td> <td bgcolor="#99CCFF">下屋久村</td> <td bgcolor="#66FFFF">昭和34年4月1日<br />町制改称 屋久町</td> </tr> </table>--> {{Kagoshima}} {{coord|30.354|N|130.53|E|type:landmark_source:itwiki|display=title}} [[Category:Districts in Kagoshima Prefecture]]
